product_name: Wasatch Powder Monkeys Cargo Box Adapter - Small
long_description: The small Wasatch Powder Monkeys Cargo Box Adapter Kit makes popular cargo boxes from Yakima and Thule compatible with the Wasatch Powder Monkeys Switchblade Crossbars (sold separately). The small Wasatch Powder Monkeys Cargo Box Adapter Kit attaches to your cargo box so you can easily slide your cargo box on and off the Switchblade Crossbars without tools. 6061 aluminum components are machined for precision and feature anodizing for strength and durability. Stainless-steel fasteners and tough nylon provide long-term durability, light weight, and high strength-to-weight ratio. Works with Yakima Rocketbox Pro 11, Thule Ascent 1100 and Frontier (not included). Kit also works with the SmartStorage Wall Storage Unit (sold separately), so you can securely mount your cargo box in the garage when not in use.
short_description: The small Wasatch Powder Monkeys Cargo Box Adapter Kit makes popular cargo boxes from Yakima and Thule compatible with the Wasatch Powder Monkeys Switchblade Crossbars (sold separately).
